mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content FROM article AS a JOIN comment_article AS ca on a.id = ca.article_id WHERE ca.user_id = #{userId} AND ca.is_deleted = 0 AND a.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY id Limit 4
